citation: Proclamation under the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Act 2016 fix 29 June 2016 as the day on which sections 1, 2, 3, 5, 20 and 22, and Parts 2 and 3, of that Act commence.

27 June 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2016
